column2: "Good job, everyone! Are you all hungry? I know I am! Want me to make something when we get back?"
"In that case... I suggest boiled meat and vegetables. Strong seasonings can be painful on tired bodies."
"How about a dessert?!! When I'm tired, I always want to eat sweets!!"
"Yeah... Plus we've been exercising so much that we don't have to worry about calories no matter how much we eat!"
"Hahaha! Alright then!! Let's see if my skills are up to the job!!"
